item.title: About
item.description: About this site Hello, I’m Edward—a computer graphics researcher driven by a fascination with pushing the boundaries of visual technology. My journey began in the dynamic realm of gaming, where I honed my skills and developed a deep understanding of immersive virtual environments. Now, as a researcher, I’m passionate about exploring cutting-edge rendering techniques and delving into the intricacies of real-time rendering and procedural content generation. My work reflects a relentless pursuit of innovation, aiming to create experiences that captivate and inspire in the ever-evolving landscape of digital artistry.

item.title: old page
item.description: Bear Website: https://bearblog.dev There is a website obesity crisis. Bloated websites are full of scripts, ads, and trackers slowing your readers down every time they try to read your well-crafted content. Bear is all you need to build a fantastic and optimized site or blog. It works perfectly on any viewing device. All you need to focus on is writing good content. Bear makes it simple to publish content online and grow an audience while keeping pages tiny, fast, and optimized for search engines.

item.title: new page copy
item.description: Bear Website: https://bearblog.dev cus on is writing good content. Bear makes it simple to publish content online and grow an audience while keeping pages tiny, fast, and optimized for search engines. Each page is ~5kb. Learn more and contribute on GitHub.
